text:
01 of 129 Katharine McPhee Katharine McPhee/Instagram "Mele kalikimaka is hawaii’s way..." the bikini-clad actress captioned this tropical snap, wishing her followers a Merry Christmas in Hawaiian.

02 of 129 Jennie Garth Jennie Garth Instagram The 90210 alum is heading into the wild! "Alaska" she captioned a photo of herself bundled up for some dog sledding in the last frontier.

03 of 129 Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas Priyanka Chopra/Instagram The newlyweds enjoyed a relaxing beach honeymoon in Oman after their spectacular five-day Indian wedding celebration at the Umaid Bhawan Palace in Jaipur. "Marital bliss they say.." Chopra captioned the casual seflie, adding the heart eyes, heart and lips emojis.

04 of 129 Lea Michele Lea Michele Instagram The pop star paused to send some love to London town with a towel selfie, before departing for a few days in the English countryside. "Till next time London," she captioned her hotel room snap.

05 of 129 Busy Philipps Busy Philipps/Instagram At the culmination of her Disney Cruise adventure, the I Feel Pretty star shared a family photo in front of Cinderella's castle at Disney World. "We did it," she wrote.

06 of 129 Heidi Klum Heidi Klum/Instagram The model posed for a photo with her boyfriend, Tom Kaulitz, and his brother Bill while on a recent getaway to Mexico.

07 of 129 Maren Morris and Ryan Hurd Maren Morris/Instagram The married country stars celebrated Morris' song "Rich" peaking at number 2 on the country charts by visiting Universal Studios' The Making of Harry Potter in the U.K. "I pinch myself over the fact that everything that’s happened to me has been because of 1 album," Morris wrote. "ONE. and now it’s time for the next chapter. thank you for making the HERO era change my life as I hope it’s changed yours for the better. love you so much. also, here’s my husband and i at Harry Potter in London."

08 of 129 Kaley Cuoco In celebration of their one-year anniversary, The Big Bang Theory star and Tan Cook visited Disney World. "Same place, same pose, same love, a year later," Cuoco wrote. "How has so much happened since then? Thanks for marrying me."

09 of 129 Robin Thicke Robin Thicke/Instagram The singer took his son, Julian, on a trip to Seoul, South Korea.

10 of 129 Usher Usher Instagram The singer made time to meet some furry locals — he also hung out with a koala! — during the Australian leg of his tour.

11 of 129 Gisele Bündchen Gisele Bündchen/Instagram The model meditateed in front of a waterfall during a recent getaway. "It’s time to stop and go inward," she writes. "Sit in silence, listen to your inner voice. Cleanse and get rid of what does not serve you anymore. Leave behind things that are holding you back."

12 of 129 Halle Berry Halle Berry/Instagram During a trip to the Sahara Desert, the actress posed for a photo (and even sent an absentee ballot for the midterm election!).

13 of 129 Olivia Culpo Halle Berry/Instagram "The comeback is always stronger than the setback," the model captioned a photo of herself standing underneath a rock and flaunting her abs in South Australia.

14 of 129 Kelsea Ballerini and Morgan Evans Kelsea Ballerini/Instagram The married country stars "hit the reset button" with a relaxing getaway to Blackberry Farm in the Great Smoky Mountains of Tennessee.

15 of 129 Bethenny Frankel Bethenny Frankel/Instagram "Sheer relaxation," the Real Housewives of New York City star wrote of her vacation to Palm Beach.

16 of 129 Brett Eldredge The country singer, who just released his Christmas album Glow Deluxe Edition, took his dog Edgar down to Islamorada, Florida for a songwriting session.

17 of 129 Jonathan Van Ness The Queer Eye star brought his mom along on a Hawaii vacation with his new beau, Wilco Froneman, and a few friends. "Took my mom to Hawaii to meet the boy & some of my closest frands for some R & R REALNESS," he wrote,"and even though I swam face first into coral as soon as I arrived, it was the most gorg 5 days a boy could ask for."

18 of 129 Elizabeth Banks Elizabeth Banks/Instagram The Hunger Games alum sports her granddad's hat while posing for a selfie on a Berlin getaway.

19 of 129 Zac Efron Zac Efron Instagram The Greatest Showman actor thanked fans for their birthday wishes (he turned 31 on October 18) with a photo of himself from Reykjavik, Iceland.

20 of 129 Mariah Carey The songstress made dumplings with her twins, Moroccan and Monroe, 7, in Taipei while visiting Taiwan on tour.

21 of 129 The Queer Eye stylist and his husband, illustrator Rob France, took a sunset selfie during their island getaway. "Beach to ourselves. Golden hour. Frizzy beach hair. Hubby," he captioned the snap.

22 of 129 Julianne Hough Julianne Hough/Instagram While perched on a ledge in Assisi, Italy, the Dancing With the Stars alum shared some wise words about how travel has inspired her to her followers. "This world is a beautiful place. Travel far and travel often," she writes. "To a new town, city, country or just a new neighborhood. Get outside your comfort zone. Explore and LIVE."

23 of 129 Mariah Carey The singer jetted off to Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, a few days before kicking off the Asian leg of her tour.

24 of 129 Maren Morris and Ryan Hurd The married country stars touched down in Palm Springs to celebrate a friend's wedding. "Wishing Tyler and Brent the happiest marriage this weekend with my Ol Blue Eyes (this is my happy look)," Morris captioned a photo with her husband.

25 of 129 Halsey Halsey/Instagram The "Bad at Love" singer sported rainbow mouse ears while vacationing at Disneyland in California. "Share some of your happy please, happiest place on earth," she wrote.

26 of 129 Reese Witherspoon Reese Witherspoon/Instagram The Whiskey in a Teacup author took a "#girlstrip" to the canyons of Sedona, Arizona, with a few of her friends. "What a treat to get away in nature with my girls!"

27 of 129 Ashley Graham Ashley Graham/Instagram The model posed in Red Square in Moscow during a recent visit to Russia.

28 of 129 Camila Morrone Camila Morrone/Instagram The model stopped for a quick break in celeb-favorite Instagram spot Antelope Canyon while hiking in Arizona.

29 of 129 Jana Kramer Jana Kramer/Instagram The pregnant country star and her husband, Mike Caussin, spent "#sundayfunday" by "soakin' in the California sun."

30 of 129 Jessie James Decker Jessie James Decker/Instagram The author of Just Jessie got a little touristy in New York City as she posed in front of Carrie Bradshaw (Sarah Jessica Parker)'s West Village apartment from Sex and the City. "I had to..." she captioned the photo.

31 of 129 Zac Efron Zac Efron/Instagram The actor posed in front of the Eiffel Tower for an artsy shot while on vacation in France. "Love in Paris," he captioned the photo.

32 of 129 Kelsea Ballerini Kelsea Ballerini/Instagram The "Legends" singer explored the mountains of Montana ahead of a show there during her tour.

33 of 129 Lupita Nyong'o Lupita Nyong'o/Instagram The Black Panther star indulged in a little rest and relaxation while lounging at the Mii Amo Spa in Sedona, Arizona. "Love is... making time for yourself from time to time," she wrote.

34 of 129 Halsey Halsey/Instagram The "Bad at Love" singer paints on a porch in Praiano, Italy, while traveling Europe with her boyfriend G-Eazy.

35 of 129 Michael Phelps Michael Phelps/Instagram The Olympic swimmer ended a romantic night in front of the Eiffel Tower in Paris, by sharing a smooch with his wife, Nicole.

36 of 129 David Beckham David Beckham/Instagram The international soccer star visited the Great Wall of China for the "first time" on Friday. "I feel so lucky that my work allows me to travel and to see beautiful places like this..." he wrote. "AMAZING ♥️"

37 of 129 Halsey Halsey/Instagram "Am I doing this right?" the "Bad at Love" singer captioned a photo of herself pretending to lick the Eiffel Tower.

38 of 129 Chase Rice Chase Rice/Instagram The "Eyes on You" singer spent his birthday weekend hunting and fishing on the Yellowstone River in Montana with his brother Casey and his mom, Connie. "Fishin’ with momma," he wrote. LIFE. IS. GOOD."

39 of 129 Ashley Benson The Pretty Little Liars alum popped open a bottle of wine in a garden in Paris.

40 of 129 Jessie James Decker Jessie James Decker/Instagram The singer and author of Just Jessie is spending a few days in the sand with her family, who she says are her "whole purpose in life."

41 of 129 Giada De Laurentiis Giada De Laurentiis/Instagram The celebrity chef soaked up the sun in Capri, Italy, with her daughter Jade, 10.

42 of 129 Andi Dorfman Andi Dorfman/Instagram The former Bachelorette sported an orange bikini while vacationing in Alys Beach, Florida. "Orange you glad I didn’t write a cheesy caption," she wrote.

43 of 129 Tim McGraw Tim McGraw/Instagram The "Humble and Kind" singer enjoyed an tropical vacation with friends full of "lots of spearfishing, good fellowship and laughter!"

44 of 129 Nick Jonas, Priyanka Chopra and Joe Jonas Joe Jonas/Instagram Joe shared a photo of his brother and future sister-in-law cooling down in the Dallas heat near an ice machine. (Joe's fiancée Sophie Turner was absent from the family hang.) "Stay Cool Kids," he writes, followed by a smiley-face emoji in a cowboy hat.

45 of 129 Sam Smith The "Too Good at Goodbyes" singer sips on a butterbeer at The Wizarding World of Harry Potter. "Brits abroad in Hogsmeade," he writes.

46 of 129 Brett Eldredge Brett Eldredge/Instagram The country star explored downtown Denver before kicking off his "The Long Way" tour. "How can you not love Denver?" he writes.

47 of 129 Lin Manuel Miranda Lin Manuel Miranda Twitter The Hamilton creator took his familiy to Venice, Italy, to celebrate his parents' 40th wedding anniversary. "Heluva Sunday, heluva 40th anniversary," he captioned a series of photos on Twitter. "40 years of PDA from my folks, bless ‘em," he wrote alongside a photo of his dad, Luis, and mom, Luz, sharing a smooch while on a gondola ride.

48 of 129 Justin Timberlake and Jessica Biel Jessica Biel Instagram The couple celebrated the end of the European leg of Timberlake's Man of the Woods tour with a romantic getaway in Italy. Biel filmed Timberlake as he drove them through the scenic countryside of Tuscany in a red convertible.

49 of 129 Kim Kardashian Kim Kardashian/Instagram The reality star shared a smooch with her 7-month-old daughter, Chicago, while on a beach vacation.

50 of 129 Anna Camp and Skylar Astin Anna Camp/Instagram The married Pitch Perfect stars celebrated their anniversary by road tripping to wine country in Northern California. "One more night till two years allllright!" Camp wrote. "At the spot where we tied the knot."

51 of 129 Alicia Keys Alicia Keys Instagram The Voice judge sports a headscarf and long braids while on vacation in Egypt. "#Vibes" she captioned the photo, followed by flower and sunshine emojis.

52 of 129 Kyra Sedgwick The former star of The Closer appears to be hiking in Arizona's slot canyons as she posts a photo of herself pointing at the camera with the caption "Grateful to Mother Earth for making things like this."

53 of 129 Katharine McPhee Katharine McPhee Instagram While on vacation in Pisa, Italy, with her fiance, David Foster, the Waitress star jokes that she thought she'd "do something nice and treat David to his first ride on a private jet."

54 of 129 Megan Fox The actress is traveling across Turkey in hopes of "finding evidence that Homer's Iliad was more than just an epic poem..."

55 of 129 Victoria Justice Victoria Justice/Instagram The former Disney star sports a pink, fruit-patterned two-piece outfit while on a vacation in her "new favorite place," Bali.

56 of 129 Laura Dern Laura Dern/Instagram The Jurassic Park star embraces nature on a fly fishing trip. "Learned so much about catch and release," she writes.

57 of 129 Victoria and David Beckham and Elton John Victoria Beckham Instagram The fashion designer and former soccer star met up with longtime family friend Elton John while cruising France's Côte d'Azur. The couple and their four kids have been globe trotting together all summer, previously making stops in Bali and Croatia and Montenegro, after shutting down rumors of a possible split.

58 of 129 Lea Michele Lea Michele Instagram The birthday girl (she turned 32 on Wednesday!) celebrated by sharing a bikini-clad selfie captioned simply "happiness." In a video of the same spot showing her hanging out on a small boat with friends jumping into the sea, she adds, "This is the best. Look at this water, it doesn't even seem real."

59 of 129 Kathryn Dennis Kathryn Dennis Instagram The Southern Charm star is practicing her high kicks in a pink bikini on a girls' trip in the Bahamas with costar Naomie Olindo and friends, as her ex Thomas Ravenel deals with the fallout from his breakup with Ashley Jacobs back on the mainland.

60 of 129 Naomi Watts The actress catches a sun-filled boat ride in Venice as she heads to the city's annual film festival. "Here we go #venicefilmfestival. Arrivata!!! Buongiorno," she captions the photo.

61 of 129 Kourtney Kardashian Kourtney Kardashian/Instagram On a recent vacation to Los Cabos, Mexico, the Keeping Up with the Kardashians star posed in an outdoor shower while wearing a shiny purple one-piece swuimsuit. "Sometimes i take all the shine," she wrote.

62 of 129 Scott Disick Scott Disick/Instagram The reality star jetted off to Punta Mita, Mexico with his son Mason, 8 (pictured) and Reign, 3—who he shares with his ex, Kourtney Kardashian.

63 of 129 Rob Lowe and Chris Pratt Rob Lowe/Instagram The Parks and Recreation alumni took a "Boy's fishing weekend" with Lowe's son Matthew, 25.

64 of 129 Kaitlyn Bristowe Kaitlyn Bristowe/Instagram The former Bachelorette sports a power pony while sipping on a glass of wine in Italy. "I’m not a chic person, but I’m gonna be chic AF on this trip," she writes.

65 of 129 Teresa Giudice Teresa Giudice/Instagram The Real Housewives of of New Jersey star poses in the "blue water" of the Bahamas with her daughter Audriana, 9.

66 of 129 Justin Timberlake Justin Timberlake/Instagram The "Can't Stop the Feeling!" singer throws up the peace sign while pedaling a bike through the streets of France.

67 of 129 Leona Lewis Leona Lewis/Instagram The "Bleeding Love" singer shows off her "girl power" during a beach vacation.

68 of 129 Molly Sims Molly Sims/Instagram "Momma might still have it," the model writes while posing during a boat day.

69 of 129 Oprah Oprah Winfrey/Instagram During a vacation to Montenegro, the media mogul opts for a shopping day over a hike.

70 of 129 Ramona Singer Ramona Singer/Instagram The Real Housewives of New York City star poses on the beach of Mykonos, Greece during a getaway with her fellow castmembers.

71 of 129 Sophia Bush Sophia Bush/Instagram The actress headed "Back to my ragazza di campagna roots," during a trip to Italy where she spent the day farming. "This would make Momma’s Nonna very proud," she writes.

72 of 129 Usher Usher/Instagram The singer stopped in Japan during his recent trip to Europe.

73 of 129 Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra Nick Jonas/Instagram The newly engaged couple celebrated in Mumbai, India, where their families met for the first time. "The only way to do this... with Family and God," Chopra wrote. "Thank you all for your wishes and blessings."

74 of 129 Pink Pink/Instagram The "What About Us" singer rode her motorcycle up Mt. Tamborine in Queensland, Australia while gearing up to continue the Australian leg of her tour.

75 of 129 Christina El Moussa Christina El Moussa/Instagram The HGTV star writes that she is "living the dream" while paddleboarding with her kids Taylor, 7, and Brayden, 3, while on vacation in Hawaii.

76 of 129 Ellie Goulding Ellie Goulding/Instagram The newly engaged singer shares a smooch with her fiancé Caspar Jopling while on board a boat.

77 of 129 Dwyane Wade and Gabrielle Union Gabrielle Union/Instagram Family getaway! During a trip to Venice, Italy for a wedding, the couple and their kids pose in their Sunday best—which includes pink suits for their sons Zaire, 16, and Xavier, 4.

78 of 129 Selena Gomez Selena Gomez/Instagram The "Wolves" singer posted a selfie from her boating girls weekend.

79 of 129 Kevin Hart Kevin Hart/Instagram Even though the comedian is the one holding the key, he let his son, Hendrix, 10, sit behind the controls of their jet ski while on a family vacation.

80 of 129 Rita Ora Rita Ora/Instagram The singer shows off her collection of tattoos while sporting a white bikini on vacation in Malta.

81 of 129 Michelle Rodriguez Michelle Rodriguez/Instagram The Fast and Furious actress jetted off to Positano, Italy, to soak up some sun on a boat with friends.

82 of 129 Chrissy Teigen and John Legend John Legend/Instagram The couple enjoy a day at the Bali Safari Park with their kids Luna, 2, and Miles, 3 months. During their extended family vacation to the Indonesian island, they have been lounging poolside, taking cooking classes, and experiencing the local cuisine.

83 of 129 Giuliana Rancic Giuliana Rancic/Instagram "No, this isn’t a photo shoot for a hat company (although these straw hats are the cutest!)," the TV host captions a photo of her family on the water at Lake Coeur d' Alene, Idaho. "It’s just a pic of a family that loves boating, fun in the sun, and yes, wearing cute hats."

84 of 129 Vanessa and Nick Lachey Vanessa Lachey/Instagram In celebration of their son Camden John starting kindergarten and turning 6 in September, the family spent a day at Disneyland.

85 of 129 TAMERA MOWRY Tamera Mowry/Instagram Grantham family 2.0? The former Sister, Sister star took her family to Highclere Castle—the house that served as the set of Downton Abbey—during her visit to the U.K.

86 of 129 DORINDA MEDLEY Dorinda Medley/Instagram The Real Housewives of New York City star is "never leaving" her "happy place" on Paradise Island in the Bahamas.

87 of 129 Heidi Klum Heidi Klum/Instagram The Project Runway judge is vacationing on the island of Capri in Italy, where she's been snorkeling and exploring the famous Blue Grotto cave.

88 of 129 Brooke Shields Brooke Shields/Instagram "Mondays are always better in a bikini," the supermodel and actress captions a photo of herself lounging on a chair during an end-of-summer beach vacation.

89 of 129 Kendra Wilkinson Kendra Wilkinson/Instagram The reality star is visiting the Great Wall of China "with my wonder of the world," her son Hank Baskett IV, 8.

90 of 129 Ramona Singer Ramona Singer/Instagram The Real Housewives of New York City cast member is enjoying a "fantastic trip" to Madrid with her daughter Avery, 23.

91 of 129 Rob Lowe Rob Lowe/Instagram The Parks and Rec actor joked around with a crocodile replica during a trip to Africa. "My first day on safari in Tanzania and already I’m in trouble," he captioned the playful photo.

92 of 129 Tom Brady and Gisele Bundchen Tom Brady Instagram The quarterback and supermodel shared a sexy smooch on the beach, in a photo shared by Brady in celebration of his wife's 38th birthday on Friday. "What a great year it has been! We love you so much! Let me count the ways..." he wrote alongside the photo. The pair have been vacationing in Costa Rica, where they own a vacation home. Earlier this week, they took the family for a horseback ride in some lush mountains.

93 of 129 Hugh Jackman Hugh Jackman Instagram The actor has been vacationing along the Italian coast with his wife, Deborra-lee Furness. A series of selfies captioned "Bellissima!" "Happy days," and "Molte grazie Italy!" show off the spectacular scenery the couple has been taking in on their European getaway.

94 of 129 Ludacris Ludacris Instagram The rapper's latest vacation comes with a scandalous history lesson: "As a Partner and a founder of the Medellín Drug Cartel with Pablo Escobar, Carlos Lehder had one of his drug running planes crash in four feet of water while attempting to land," he writes alongside this underwater selfie showing the fuselage of an old plane in the tropical water. "He used a remote island as a transshipment base for smuggling cocaine into the United States. And Damn right I scratched swimming in, over & around it off my Bucket List today."

96 of 129 Kate Hudson Kate Hudson Instagram The pregnant star is enjoying a babymoon with her "girls in Greece," including Search Party actress Meredith Hagner and and stylist Jamie Mizrahi. The group visited Lalaria beach on the island of Skiarthos, which Hudson says she visits every year. "She never lets us down," she says.

97 of 129 Natalie Portman Natalie Portman Instagram The Star Wars alum caught up with a storm trooper while visiting Disneyland in California. "Thank you, @Disneyland, for making me smile all day when I needed it most," the Oscar winner wrote on her post, which also included a photo of her donning Minnie ears on Main Street USA.

98 of 129 Jessica Alba Jessica Alba Instagram The Honest Co. founder jetted off to Paris for some brand business, but the mom of three also got in some shopping, dining and touristing time! She stopped by the Eiffel Tower and checked out some home decor at Merci Paris.

99 of 129 Christie Brinkley The supermodel-mom was all smiles outside the infamous, celeb-favorite Hotel du Cap Eden Roc in the South of France. "You don't stop laughing because you grow older. You grow older because you stop laughing," she wrote alongside the casual photo, quoting French actor Maurice Chevalier.

100 of 129 Brody Jenner and Kaitlynn Carter Kaitlynn Carter Jenner Instagram The newlyweds, who recently tied the knot on the Indonesian island of Sumba, touched down in the Maldives this week for a luxe honeymoon in an overwater bungalow at Six Senses Laambu.

101 of 129 Ellen DeGeneres and Portia de Rossi "This was a trip I've been waiting my whole life to make," the talk show host writes of her experience visiting endangered mountain gorillas in Rwanda. Her wife, Portia de Rossi, gifted Degeneres with a wildlife center and new conservation foundation in her name, for her 60th birthday in February.

102 of 129 Usher Usher Instagram The singer toured Egypt's isolated Siwa Oasis near the border of Libya, where he took in the famous ruins of the city (home to an ancient oracle) and tried on some of the local clothing styles.

103 of 129 Aidy Bryant The newlywed SNL star, who tied the knot with longtime boyfriend Conner O'Malley in May, is currently honeymooning in Italy. "Hi! i stood on a bunch a books in Italy today," she captioned a cute travel dispatch from Venice's Libreria Acqua Alta, famous for its highly instagrammable book steps.

104 of 129 Lucy Hale The Pretty Little Liars alum is sipping on a coconut at the beach in Cambodia, where she also visited children at a local orphanage.

105 of 129 The Honest Co. founder and husband Cash Warren embraced "that tourist life in Beijing." Jessica Alba

106 of 129 Sofia Richie and Scott Disick Sofia Richie/Instagram The couple celebrated Disick's 35th birthday with a beach getaway. "Happy Birthday babe! Thank you for being you. Love you," the 19-year-old captioned her cute swimming snap.

107 of 129 Behati Prinsloo Behati Prinsloo/Instagram “Always center of attention,” writes the new mom of two, as she poses topside on a boat beside husband Adam Levine.

108 of 129 Priyanka Chopra Priyanka Chopra/Instagram After attending Prince Harry and Meghan Markle’s wedding, the Quantico star teamed up with Unicef and traveled to Bangladesh to visit the Balukhali refugee camp, one of the largest in the world.

109 of 129 Kourtney Kardashian Kourtney Kardashian/Instagram The mom of three had some very important business to attend to at Disneyland. “Had to go check on my castle,” she captions this photo of her smooching Mickey Mouse with daughter Penelope, 5, at her side.

110 of 129 Kourtney Kardashian Kourtney Kardashian Instagram The eldest Kardashian sister escaped to Utah's Amangiri resort — a favorite of her whole family — with boyfriend Younes Bendjima to celebrate his 25th birhtday.

111 of 129 Jessica Simpson Jessica Simpson Instagram The singer "taught" her husband, retired NFL star Eric Johnson, to combine two art forms — the vacation selfie and the closet selfie — to create this sultry snap Simpson posted on Instagram.

112 of 129 Pink Pink Instagram Pink hit the beach in Florida with her husband, Carey Hart, and their kids, Jameson Moon, 15 months, and Willow Sage, 6. "Friggin Ft. Lauderdale," writes PEOPLE's Most Beautiful issue cover star

113 of 129 Ellie Goulding and Karlie Kloss Ellie Goulding Instagram The British singer and American supermodel met up in the Valley of the Moon in Jordan's Wadi Rum Desert to cruise around on some 4x4s at what Kloss dubs "goulden hour."

114 of 129 Kourtney Kardashian Kourtney Kardashian Instagram Why check into a five-star hotel when you can go glamping in a tricked out airstream? As part of her multi-day birthday celebration, the Keeping Up star stayed in this $650-per-night trailer in Malibu, where the listing includes some interesting warnings about the local wildlife.

115 of 129 Bella Hadid Bella Hadid Instagram The supermodel is a vision in the desert! Hadid shared this vacation house, which goes for $350,000 per weekend with sister Gigi during Coachella. The 40-acre property feaures a massive pool and a man-made beach.

116 of 129 Gisele Bündchen Gisele Bundchen/Instagram The supermodel and her New England Patriots star husband Tom Brady hit the beach with some hump-backed friends while on a trip in the Middle East. “What a special day!” she wrote alongside the photo of the couple riding camels.

117 of 129 Tom Holland Tom Holland/Instagram The Avengers: Infinity War star enjoyed "a cup of matcha tea...the proper way," while in Japan.

118 of 129 Kim and Kourtney Kardashian Kim shared a bikini-clad snap from the sisters' recent Turks & Caicos vacation, where they were also joined by Kourtney's boyfriend, Younes Bendjima, to celebrate #nationalsiblingday.

119 of 129 Reese Witherspoon The Big Little Lies star made the most of her family getaway, soaking up some last rays of tropical sunshine with her son, Tennessee, 5. "Last day of Spring Break! Dancing til it’s dark with this guy," she captions the sweet photo.

120 of 129 Ryan Seacrest The Live! cohost and girlfriend Shayna Terese Taylor have gotten about as far from the Hollywood spotlight as possible as the former battles ongoing sexual misconduct allegations. Taylor shared this snap of the couple on camelback in the Sahara Desert following a stay at the Hotel Royal Mansour in Marrakech, Morocco.

121 of 129 Hilary Duff HIlary Duff Instagram Hilary Duff "had the best time celebrating Luca’s birthday" at Atlantis Resort. "We spent time with the incredible Hurricane Katrina rescue dolphins!!" writes the Younger star, 30. Love that a portion of what we did there went back to the resort’s Blue Project Foundation, which supports marine life and conservation work in The Bahamas."

122 of 129 Christie Brinkley Christie Brinkley Instagram The supermodel says "Peace out" from her gorgeous home, dubbed Lucky House, in Turks and Caicos. The tropical retreat lived up to its name when it was "for the most part spared" during Hurricane Maria last fall, and seems to be back in full vacation mode for Brinkley, who's been enjoying island life since St. Patrick's Day.

123 of 129 Katherine Heigl Katherine Heigl Instagram The actress says she "may never leave" Mexico, where she's vacationing with husband Josh Kelley, and their children, Nancy, 9, Adalaide, 5, and Joshua, 1. "Those heavenly days are plentiful in this extraordinarily beautiful, peaceful, serene spot," she writes alongside a gallery of beach day photos.

124 of 129 Al Roker and Savannah Guthrie Savannah Guthrie Instagram The TODAY hosts may be on duty while visiting South Korea for the Winter Olympics, but Al and Savannah still managed to sneak in a little hot tub time on their last day in PyeongChang.

125 of 129 Martha Stewart Martha Stewart Instagram The lifestyle mogul is far from home, traveling around Antarctica by boat, visiting penguins, and posting a continent's worth of iceberg photos on Instagram. This selfie was snapped at latitude 66, appropriately near the Martha Strait.

126 of 129 Sophie Turner Sophie Turner Instagram The Game of Thrones star and her fiance, DNCE's Joe Jonas, escaped to the Maldives, a celeb-favorite island chain in the Indian Ocean. The pair are staying at the uber-luxurious Coco Prive.

128 of 129 John Stamos and Caitlin McHugh Caitlin McHugh Instagram The Fuller House star is the "#happiestmanonearth" in the "#happiestplaceonearth," as he and new wife Caitlin McHugh honeymoon in Disney World — and don bride and groom mouse ears, of course.
title: Celebrity Vacations: Where Stars Get Away

meta_data.description: Stars share inside their travels on Instagram
meta_data.sailthru.author: Mackenzie Schmidt

og.title: Celebrity Vacations: Where Stars Get Away
og.description: Stars share inside their travels on Instagram

twitter.title: Celebrity Vacations: Where Stars Get Away
twitter.description: Stars share inside their travels on Instagram
